article_title: Venrock Invests $18 Million In Jiff To Drive Consumer Use Of Digital Health Tools

article_metadata.author: Zina Moukheiber

og.description: Studies on the impact of workplace wellness programs point to mixed results on their ability to lower health care costs and improve health outcomes. One key finding by Rand, which published a study last year, shows that although half of employers offer wellness programs, less than half of employees use [...]
